entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, L'Assomption

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
